source: TEXT_HEAVNA504_01645_SEQ_00<tab>Lonu Vanu would like very much for you to enjoy the hospitality of his village.
target: TEXT_HEAVNA504_01645_SEQ_00<tab>ブルーウィンドウのロヌバヌは、お礼をしたいようだ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNA504_01645_SEQ_01<tab>Out of gratitude to you and Alphinaud, Lonu Vanu invites you to his village, leaving before you can make your excuses. Consult with Alphinaud and decide whether to follow or not.
target: TEXT_HEAVNA504_01645_SEQ_01<tab>ロヌバヌは、助けてくれたお礼にと、大らかなズンドの村へ冒険者を案内したいようだ。彼の案内を受けるべきだろうか？ブルーウィンドウの「アルフィノ」と相談しよう。

source: TEXT_HEAVNA504_01645_SEQ_02<tab>Surmising that the Vanu may know the whereabouts of the archbishop and the Heavens' Ward, Alphinaud suggests you accept Lonu Vanu's offer of hospitality. Journey to the north and seek out the Vanu youth.
target: TEXT_HEAVNA504_01645_SEQ_02<tab>アルフィノと相談した結果、ズンドの村へ行くことになった。アバラシア雲海のオク・ズンド付近にいる「ロヌバヌ」と話そう。

source: TEXT_HEAVNA504_01645_SEQ_03<tab>Shortly after you and Alphinaud arrive in the Vanu village, the sound of cannon fire reverberates throughout the Sea of Clouds, sending everyone scrambling to search for the source. When Cid subsequently arrives, he explains that the imperials have engaged Bismarck, and together you turn your eyes heavensward even as the primal's massive body casts a shadow over all. Before your disbelieving eyes, Bismarck opens wide its great maw and swallows an island whole. At this, Lonu Vanu cries out with a mixture of rage and despair, but refuses to dwell on the actions of an unfathomable god, instead urging you to speak with Sonu Vanu, chieftain of the Zundu.
target: TEXT_HEAVNA504_01645_SEQ_03<tab>ロヌバヌと話した。その最中、ガレマール帝国のアグリウス級空中戦艦と、蛮神「ビスマルク」が戦う場面を目撃した。戦いで傷ついた蛮神「ビスマルク」は、浮島ごとクリスタルを食らったようだ。オク・ズンドの「ロヌバヌ」と話そう。

source: TEXT_HEAVNA504_01645_SEQ_04<tab>Chief Sonu reveals that the archbishop and the Heavens' Ward are come to the Sea of Clouds in search of the key to Azys Lla, a land of forbidden secrets. However, their quest has been complicated by the fact that Bismarck, the insatiable white whale, has devoured the island upon which the key was kept. Though some might think the belly of a primal an ideal repository for so dangerous an artifact, Alphinaud's expression makes it abundantly clear that he is not one of them.
target: TEXT_HEAVNA504_01645_SEQ_04<tab>ロヌバヌに案内され、ズンド族の長老ソヌバヌから話を聞いた。ソヌバヌによると、教皇たちは「魔大陸の鍵」を探していたらしい。しかし「魔大陸の鍵」は、鍵を封じた社島ごと、蛮神「ビスマルク」に食べられたのだそうだ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNA504_01645_LONUVANU_000_000<tab>Lonu Vanu owes much and more to netherlings. As saviors, as heroes, Zundu welcome you!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNA504_01645_LONUVANU_000_000とても、とても、ロヌバヌは喜んでいるだよ！
旅のおヒトさまが助けてくれるとは、思わなかったね！

source: TEXT_HEAVNA504_01645_LONUVANU_000_001<tab>To village we go! To north! Come, come!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNA504_01645_LONUVANU_000_001さあ、さあ、案内するね！
大らかなズンドの村が、北にあるのだよ！

source: TEXT_HEAVNA504_01645_ALPHINAUD_000_002<tab>And so we live to fight another day...
target:
TEXT_HEAVNA504_01645_ALPHINAUD_000_002やれやれ、遭遇戦だったが、無事に切り抜けられたね。
しかし、ガレマール帝国軍まで進出してきているとは……。

source: TEXT_HEAVNA504_01645_CID_000_003<tab>Imperial troops? Here? Well, hopefully that's the last of them. We'll keep our eyes open, either way.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNA504_01645_CID_000_003なにっ、ガレマール帝国軍と遭遇しただって？
ともかく無事で何よりだが……こちらも警戒しておく。
奴らも飛空艇を使って、来ているはずだからな。

source: TEXT_HEAVNA504_01645_WEDGE_000_004<tab>Garleans!? Understood. We'll send word to the Temple Knights.
TEXT_HEAVNA504_01645_BIGGS_000_005<tab>All quiet here, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. No Vanu, no Garleans, nothing.
TEXT_HEAVNA504_01645_ALPHINAUD_000_010<tab>So the Garleans were searching for the archbishop and believed that the Vanu Vanu knew something of his whereabouts.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNA504_01645_ALPHINAUD_000_010妙な成り行きになってきたな……。
ガレマール帝国の部隊も、教皇の行方を捜しているようだった。

source: TEXT_HEAVNA504_01645_ALPHINAUD_000_011<tab>Methods notwithstanding, they may have had the right of it...
target:
TEXT_HEAVNA504_01645_ALPHINAUD_000_011おそらく、先ほど助けたバヌバヌ族から、
情報を引き出そうとしていたのだろうが……。

source: TEXT_HEAVNA504_01645_ALPHINAUD_000_012<tab>I conclude that we should accept Lonu Vanu's offer of hospitality, and visit his village.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNA504_01645_ALPHINAUD_000_012ともかく、「ロヌバヌ」の招きを受けて見るとしよう。
教皇の行方と、帝国軍の動向……
詳しいことを尋ねてみる必要がありそうだ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNA504_01645_ALPHINAUD_000_013<tab>I want to believe Lonu Vanu is sincere in his intentions. Nevertheless, keep your eyes open, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNA504_01645_ALPHINAUD_000_013ここが、バヌバヌ族の集落か……。
彼らは問答無用で襲ってくる様子はない……ようだ。
頃合いをみて行ってみるとしよう。

source: TEXT_HEAVNA504_01645_LONUVANU_000_020<tab>Like breeze guides leaves to rest, come and lay down your burdens, netherlings! Lonu Vanu throws wide arms in greeting! Behold─Ok' Zundu!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNA504_01645_LONUVANU_000_020よくぞ、よくぞ、おいでになったよ！
ここが大いなるバヌバヌの、大らかなズンドの村ね！

source: TEXT_HEAVNA504_01645_ALPHINAUD_000_021<tab>A far warmer welcome than the one you received from the Vundu, I think.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNA504_01645_ALPHINAUD_000_021どうやら、ここにいる者たちは、
以前に君が出会ったというバヌバヌ族とは違い、温厚のようだ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNA504_01645_LONUVANU_000_022<tab>Hah! Vundu bluster and blow hither and yon. Sound and fury, like aimless gale.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNA504_01645_LONUVANU_000_022それは、それは、当然のことね。
冷酷なるブンドと、一緒にしてもらっては困るのだよ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNA504_01645_LONUVANU_000_023<tab>Eh!? What unseen lightning begets such thunderous report!?
TEXT_HEAVNA504_01645_CID_000_024<tab>There you are! Did you see it!?
TEXT_HEAVNA504_01645_CID_000_025<tab>It's that damned flying whale again! The imperials are after it!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNA504_01645_CID_000_025聞いてくれ！
雲海の中で、帝国軍の巨大飛空戦艦が、蛮神と交戦してやがる。
例の雲海を泳ぐ、獣型の蛮神だ！
TEXT_HEAVNA504_01645_ALPHINAUD_000_027<tab>雲神「ビスマルク」と帝国軍が！？

source: TEXT_HEAVNA504_01645_ALPHINAUD_000_029<tab>By the Twelve... Did the beast just <var 1A 02 /var>eat<var 1A 01 /var> that island!?
target: TEXT_HEAVNA504_01645_ALPHINAUD_000_029<tab>あれは……浮島のクリスタルを喰ったのか！？

source: TEXT_HEAVNA504_01645_LONUVANU_000_030<tab>O insatiable White, O devourer of worlds! Why must You torment us!?
target:
TEXT_HEAVNA504_01645_LONUVANU_000_030ぬおおおおおん！
まただ、まただ、浮島が食べられたね！
これは、これは、一大事よ！

source: TEXT_HEAVNA504_01645_LONUVANU_000_031<tab>Bah! Lonu Vanu wastes no more words on His unfathomable deeds. Come, netherlings! Come and break words with chief of Zundu!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNA504_01645_LONUVANU_000_031旅のおヒトさま、ズンドの長老さまに会ってほしいね！
このまま雲神さまを放って置いたら、
バヌバヌが住む島は、全部雲海の底に落ちちゃうだよ！

source: TEXT_HEAVNA504_01645_LONUVANU_000_040<tab>With wisdom deep as nethers and eyes clear as cloudless blue, Sonu Vanu speaks for Zundu. Hearken to his words!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNA504_01645_LONUVANU_000_040一大事、一大事、これは一大事ね！
さあ、さあ、はやく、長老さまに紹介するね！

source: TEXT_HEAVNA504_01645_LONUVANU_000_041<tab>Netherlings deliver Lonu Vanu from claws of steel-shod fiends and prove nobility. He knows not to ignore zephyr winds, and brings before you with all haste.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNA504_01645_LONUVANU_000_041長老さま、長老さま！
悪いヒトから、ロヌバヌを救ってくれた、
良いヒトの勇者をお連れしましただよ！

source: TEXT_HEAVNA504_01645_SONUVANU_000_042<tab>Soft rains to soothe the heart and sunshine to warm. Gratitude of Sonu, chief of Zundu, is boundless.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNA504_01645_SONUVANU_000_042これは、これは、歓迎せねばなるまいな！
ロヌバヌを救ってくれたこと、
島を潤す雨のように、感謝いたしましょう。

source: TEXT_HEAVNA504_01645_ALPHINAUD_000_043<tab>We are honored to meet you, Chief Sonu. I am Alphinaud Leveilleur, and these are my companions <var 29 EB02 /var> and Cid Garlond.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNA504_01645_ALPHINAUD_000_043大いなるバヌバヌの、大らかなズンドの長老よ。
お初にお目にかかります……私の名はアルフィノ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNA504_01645_ALPHINAUD_000_044<tab>We are come in search of an airship─a flying vessel of the nethers─which we believe is somewhere in the cloud sea.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNA504_01645_ALPHINAUD_000_044我々は、雲海を荒らす者たちを追い、
天駆ける船で、この地に参りました。

source: TEXT_HEAVNA504_01645_SONUVANU_000_045<tab>Ah, like to black steel-shod contraption from which you save Lonu Vanu?
target:
TEXT_HEAVNA504_01645_SONUVANU_000_045それは、それは、難儀なことを……。
貴方がたが追っているのは、ロヌバヌらを襲った、
黒き鎧の者どもでしょうか？

source: TEXT_HEAVNA504_01645_ALPHINAUD_000_046<tab>Alas, no. That ship belongs to the Garlean Empire─an old enemy of ours...though not the enemy we are looking for at present.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNA504_01645_ALPHINAUD_000_046いいえ……
彼ら、ガレマール帝国の者も敵ではありますが……。

source: TEXT_HEAVNA504_01645_ALPHINAUD_000_047<tab>The men we seek wear armor of purest white, and are led by an older man in white robes.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNA504_01645_ALPHINAUD_000_047我らが追っているのは、
年老いた人物に率いられた白き鎧の者たちです。
見かけたことはありませんか？

source: TEXT_HEAVNA504_01645_LONUVANU_000_048<tab>Wait! Lonu Vanu hear tell of these netherlings!
target: TEXT_HEAVNA504_01645_LONUVANU_000_048<tab>あるぞ、あるぞ、白き鎧の者たちを見ただよ！

source: TEXT_HEAVNA504_01645_SONUVANU_000_050<tab>As sun rises and falls and returns, we are. Zundu scouts can testify to words of Lonu Vanu.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNA504_01645_SONUVANU_000_050確かに、確かに……
輝く太陽に誓って申し上げるが、
村の者たちが、幾人もそれらしきヒトを目撃しております。

source: TEXT_HEAVNA504_01645_LONUVANU_000_051<tab>Aye, aye! Winds carry purpose of netherlings to our ears as well. Netherlings seek key to Azys Lla!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNA504_01645_LONUVANU_000_051そうだ、そうだ、白き鎧の者たちは、
「魔大陸の鍵」を探しにやって来ただよ！

source: TEXT_HEAVNA504_01645_CID_000_052<tab>Now we're getting somewhere! Tell us, Chief Sonu: what exactly is this “Azys Lla”?
target: TEXT_HEAVNA504_01645_CID_000_052<tab>ようやく、手がかりのお出ましか！

source: TEXT_HEAVNA504_01645_SONUVANU_000_053<tab>Beware, netherlings, for blackest clouds portend greatest danger. Look not into heart of tempest. There lies ancient birthplace of sin, home of forbidden secrets. To speak more is to call the wind!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNA504_01645_SONUVANU_000_053我らバヌバヌ族に古より伝わる、魔を生む浮遊大陸……
しかし、しかし、「魔大陸」は禁忌の地。
語ることさえ禁じられた、おぞましい場所……。

source: TEXT_HEAVNA504_01645_LONUVANU_000_054<tab>But the White devours isle where key is kept. Deep within bowels of mighty Bismarck, it lies, beyond reach of the foolhardy!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNA504_01645_LONUVANU_000_054だけど、だけど、安心するね！　鍵もうない！
冷酷なるブンドが、鍵を封じた社島を、
雲神さまに食べさせちゃったね！

TEXT_HEAVNA504_01645_CID_000_055島ごと蛮神のエサにしちまったってことか……？
……やれやれ、やってくれるぜ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNA504_01645_SONUVANU_000_056<tab>Rejoice not in His gluttony, Lonu Vanu, for as stone gives way to water and wind, all yields to the White.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNA504_01645_SONUVANU_000_056確かに、確かに、ロヌバヌが申すとおりです。
一氏族に過ぎなかったブンドは、
雲神さまを招き、その力で多くの氏族を平らげました。

source: TEXT_HEAVNA504_01645_LONUVANU_000_057<tab>This he knows, Chief Sonu. Madness of Vundu bodes ill for all Vanu...
target:
TEXT_HEAVNA504_01645_LONUVANU_000_057今や、今や、ほとんど全部の氏族が、冷酷なるブンドの傘下ね！
雲神さまは、島を食べちゃうけど、
たまにはいいこともするのだよ！

source: TEXT_HEAVNA504_01645_ALPHINAUD_000_058<tab>When you described it as a “flying feathered whale,” I naturally assumed you had taken some liberties...
TEXT_HEAVNA504_01645_CID_000_059<tab>It'll take a lot more than imperial cannons to bring that beast down...
target:
TEXT_HEAVNA504_01645_CID_000_059帝国軍もやってくれるぜ。
蛮神相手にドンパチかましてくれるなんてよ！
